meanings.sent1: The hungry child was mawing the delicious cake at the party.
meanings.sent2: The wolf was mawing its prey in the dark forest.
meanings.sent3: I couldn't believe how fast my friend was mawing down the pizza slices!
meanings.sent4: The vacuum cleaner seemed to be mawing up all the dirt on the floor.
meanings.sent5: The competitive eater was mawing through hot dogs at an incredible speed.

meanings.definition: The mouth or throat of a voracious animal
meanings.sent1: The lion's mawing was a fearsome sight as it devoured its prey.
meanings.sent2: The shark's mawing was wide open as it approached the seal.
meanings.sent3: The dragon's mawing was so big it could fit a whole sheep in one bite!
meanings.sent4: The crocodile's mawing snapped shut with incredible force.
meanings.sent5: The bear's mawing was stained with the blood of its recent catch.

meanings.sent1: The abandoned house had a mawing in its roof where the sunlight streamed through.
meanings.sent2: The cave entrance was a dark mawing leading into the unknown depths.
meanings.sent3: The old well had a mawing that seemed to swallow any sound that came near.
meanings.sent4: The tornado left a mawing of destruction in its wake.
meanings.sent5: The canyon's mawing seemed to stretch endlessly into the horizon.
